thread.title: 21 Savage Old People Who Are Retired From Your Bullshit
thread.title_full: 21 Savage Old People Who Are Retired From Your Bullshit

author: Jessica Misener
title: 21 Savage Old People Who Are Retired From Your Bullshit
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @WhaddupGregg ID: 10547973 2. And Grandma Mary, who will drag you without shame. View this image › 
Twitter: @_kaffywilliams ID: 10547966 3. This painful trip to the burn center. View this image › 
Twitter: @Mackenziedumas ID: 10548036 4. Grandma Phyllis, who is just ice-cold. View this image › 
Twitter: @KatelynWork ID: 10569885 5. And this grandma who isn’t here for your ghosting. View this image › 
Twitter: @Longdon_kieran ID: 10547751 6. Linda, who fucking CAME for Cindy. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10548059 7. Grandpa Pete. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10547942 8. And this grandpa, who did what we all secretly want to do in the group text. View this image › 
Twitter: @arosselot27 ID: 10569907 9. This old man who doesn’t have time for your flower still life bullshit. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10547836 10. Nana’s subtle drag. My nana is savage
— mk (@hazandniall) ID: 10569817 11. And this grandmother who found a new you already. my grandma is a savage and texted this to all the grandkids
— Mackenzie Dunn (@Mack_Dunn) ID: 10547997 12. The nana who read you before you even realized it. View this image › 
instagram.com ID: 10569774 13. This grandpa who wasn’t born fucking yesterday. View this image › 
reddit.com ID: 10547733 14. And also this grandpa. Savage grandpa
— sarahhh (@sarah_atwood7) ID: 10547992 15. This grandma who refused to take a hint. my grandmother is savage
— Brianna Valdez (@bri_valdezz) Twitter: @bri_valdezz ID: 10570138 16. This savage Cards Against Humanity player. View this image › 
reddit.com ID: 10547723 17. The old man who leaves these cards on windshields as, you know, a gift. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10547788 18. This optimistic grandma. View this image › 
reddit.com ID: 10547964 19. Jo Ann, who’s NOT impressed. View this image › 
reddit.com ID: 10547307 20. This grandma who gives zero fucks. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10548054 21. And Grandma Pat, who is NOT a Kylie Jenner fan. View this image › 
Twitter: @alexisdomina ID: 10548003 YA BURNT. View this image › 
reactiongifs.com ID: 10569959
